title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor fills in to react to wild moves in NBA free agency including Kevin Durant's surprise decision to request a trade from the Brooklyn Nets. She gives her top 5 destinations Durant should consider as he looks for a new team next season. She also explains why USC and UCLA made the right call leaving for the BIG 10. Plus, NBA insider Kevin O'Connor joins the show to give his thoughts on all the NBA free agency madness. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
